oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Relief Association of East Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Relief Association of East Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Relief Association of East Tennessee. Records of the Proceedings of the Executive Committee of the Relief Association of East Tennessee. February 8, 1864 - May 12, 1868. Rev. Thomas W. Humes, chairman. For the relief of "needy and destitute citizens." Relief for Union supporters in East Tennessee during and after the Civil War. Handwritten manuscript volume.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Charitable organizations;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
